ygData.subject: Re: [EQCheats] Digest Number 223
ygData.msgSnippet: Please remove me from your list.  I do not want to recieve your e-mails. Thank you. ... From:  To:  Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
Please remove me from your list. I do not want to recieve your e-mails.
Thank you.

----- Original Message -----
From: <EQCheats@yahoogroups.com>
To: <EQCheats@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, November 08, 2002 8:21 AM
Subject: [EQCheats] Digest Number 223

> Message: 1
> Date: Thu, 7 Nov 2002 09:08:50 -0800 (PST)
> From: Jeff Roberts <anotherjeff@...>
> Subject: Re: Greetings and a ?
>
> The Bronze is also a fairly common drop of the goblins in Butcherblock
> Mtns. There are some wandering goblins, but also wandering orges,
> which at your level are lethal. Go with some backup. There are 2
> goblin camps as well (not the aqua goblins, those are light blue
> skinned, stick with green skin goblins).
>
> As Laurie pointed out, there are Cultural Forges, and regular forges.
> You may be using a Cultural Forge (they would say something like Elven
> Forge, or Dwarven Forge in the title vs just Forge). Find just a
> "Forge" and try again on the sharpening. It is only one sharpening
> stone.
>
> Thardur
> Dwarven Cleric
> Master Smith, Master Potter, Master Baker, Master Brewer
> Tarew Marr
>
> --- Laurie <princesslaurie@...> wrote:

> >

> > > I am working on a High Elf Pally and am really enjoying building
> > this

> > > I am 8th level and the quest is rated 10th to 15th level.I started
> > > the quest (talking to the Seria elf in the pally house) I killed
> > the
> > > masked spy and the Gen. Orc (with the help of a Dwarf with a Big
> > > hammer.) (Note: the Spy and the Gen. Orc can be found talking
> > > together at -2096.28, 2326.77 in Greater Faydark)and they can be
> > > pulled with spells one at a time) I got their heads and turned them
> >
> > > in to Seria and got the dull sword I'm to sharpen the sword, and
> > turn
> > > it in with some arborean amber and a P.forest drakeling scale to
> > get
> > > the first pally sword....well the dum sword will not sharpen, I use
> > 1
> > > and 2 sharping stones, the sword and put them in the forge in the

> > another

> >
> > > the high elf city and if so where or is it because I am only 8th

> > > my 2nd ? is on the first Pally armor quest where or what in the
